Articles.Content:
I was building a space shuttle, and when I clicked the launch vessel button, it loaded me into a sky blue screen. the time was set for 9999999 years 9999days 999minuts etc. the altitude was 000000000.000 above the surface, and everything was acting so weird! when I checked the map, it was all normal except for the fact that it was focused on the sun. I waited a few minutes and nothing happened. I tried clicking things in the staging mode but it did not work. RCS and SAS buttons where a weird gray color and the text was white. eventually, I got tired of it and did an ALT+F4 and closed the program. when I opened it back up and clicked resume saved, the resume saved menu came up like normal., but when I selected the saved world that I had glitched on, and clicked "load" the button gave the indent animation like it always does when you click on it, but this time it didn't open the world. it just clicked waited for about half a second, and the unclicked. other worlds will open but this one won't! this is what the alt+f12 menu looks like

LINK TO IMAGE OF DEBUG MENU
still got no answer. please help me.
